## 5. ä»£ç ç¤ºä¾‹ï¼ˆéƒ¨åˆ†ï¼‰

### 5.1 axios å°è£…ï¼ˆsrc/api/axios.jsï¼‰

```js
import axios from 'axios';

const instance = axios.create({
  baseURL: 'http://localhost:8000/api', // åç«¯APIåœ°å€
  timeout: 10000,
});

instance.interceptors.request.use(config => {
  const token = localStorage.getItem('token');
  if (token) config.headers.Authorization = `Bearer ${token}`;
  return config;
});

export default instance;
```

### 5.2 ç™»å½•APIï¼ˆsrc/api/user.jsï¼‰

```js
import axios from './axios';

export function login(username, password) {
  const data = new URLSearchParams();
  data.append('username', username);
  data.append('password', password);
  return axios.post('/user/login', data);
}

export function changePassword(username, oldPassword, newPassword) {
  return axios.post('/user/change-password', { username, old_password: oldPassword, new_password: newPassword });
}
```

### 5.3 å…¬å¸ä¿¡æ¯APIï¼ˆsrc/api/company.jsï¼‰

```js
import axios from './axios';

export function getCompanyInfo() {
  return axios.get('/company/');
}

export function createCompanyInfo(data) {
  return axios.post('/company/', data);
}

export function updateCompanyInfo(data) {
  return axios.put('/company/', data);
}

export function deleteCompanyInfo() {
  return axios.delete('/company/');
}
```

### 5.4 åˆ†ç±»APIï¼ˆsrc/api/category.jsï¼‰

```js
import axios from './axios';

export function getCategories() {
  return axios.get('/category/');
}

export function createCategory(data) {
  return axios.post('/category/', data);
}

export function updateCategory(id, data) {
  return axios.put(`/category/${id}`, data);
}

export function deleteCategory(id) {
  return axios.delete(`/category/${id}`);
}
```

### 5.5 äº§å“APIï¼ˆsrc/api/product.jsï¼‰

```js
import axios from './axios';

export function getProducts(params) {
  return axios.get('/product/', { params });
}

export function createProduct(data) {
  return axios.post('/product/', data);
}

export function updateProduct(id, data) {
  return axios.put(`/product/${id}`, data);
}

export function deleteProduct(id) {
  return axios.delete(`/product/${id}`);
}
```

### 5.6 è¯¢ä»·APIï¼ˆsrc/api/inquiry.jsï¼‰

```js
import axios from './axios';

export function getInquiries(params) {
  return axios.get('/inquiry/', { params });
}

export function getInquiry(id) {
  return axios.get(`/inquiry/${id}`);
}
```

## 2. å…³é”®æ–‡ä»¶å†…å®¹

### 2.1 src/api/axios.js

```js
import axios from 'axios';

const instance = axios.create({
  baseURL: 'http://localhost:8000/api',
  timeout: 10000,
});

instance.interceptors.request.use(config => {
  const token = localStorage.getItem('token');
  if (token) config.headers.Authorization = `Bearer ${token}`;
  return config;
});

export default instance;
```

### 2.2 src/api/user.js

```js
import axios from './axios';

export function login(username, password) {
  const data = new URLSearchParams();
  data.append('username', username);
  data.append('password', password);
  return axios.post('/user/login', data);
}

export function changePassword(username, oldPassword, newPassword) {
  return axios.post('/user/change-password', { username, old_password: oldPassword, new_password: newPassword });
}
```

### 2.3 src/api/company.js

```js
import axios from './axios';

export function getCompanyInfo() {
  return axios.get('/company/');
}

export function createCompanyInfo(data) {
  return axios.post('/company/', data);
}

export function updateCompanyInfo(data) {
  return axios.put('/company/', data);
}

export function deleteCompanyInfo() {
  return axios.delete('/company/');
}
```

### 2.4 src/api/category.js

```js
import axios from './axios';

export function getCategories() {
  return axios.get('/category/');
}

export function createCategory(data) {
  return axios.post('/category/', data);
}

export function updateCategory(id, data) {
  return axios.put(`/category/${id}`, data);
}

export function deleteCategory(id) {
  return axios.delete(`/category/${id}`);
}
```

### 2.5 src/api/product.js

```js
import axios from './axios';

export function getProducts(params) {
  return axios.get('/product/', { params });
}

export function createProduct(data) {
  return axios.post('/product/', data);
}

export function updateProduct(id, data) {
  return axios.put(`/product/${id}`, data);
}

export function deleteProduct(id) {
  return axios.delete(`/product/${id}`);
}
```

### 2.6 src/api/inquiry.js

```js
import axios from './axios';

export function getInquiries(params) {
  return axios.get('/inquiry/', { params });
}

export function getInquiry(id) {
  return axios.get(`/inquiry/${id}`);
}
```

---

## 3. è·¯ç”±é…ç½® src/router/index.js

```js
import { createRouter, createWebHistory } from 'vue-router';
import Login from '../views/Login.vue';
import Dashboard from '../views/Dashboard.vue';
import CompanyInfo from '../views/CompanyInfo.vue';
import CategoryManage from '../views/CategoryManage.vue';
import ProductManage from '../views/ProductManage.vue';
import InquiryManage from '../views/InquiryManage.vue';
import UserProfile from '../views/UserProfile.vue';

const routes = [
  { path: '/login', component: Login },
  {
    path: '/',
    component: Dashboard,
    children: [
      { path: '', redirect: '/company' },
      { path: 'company', component: CompanyInfo },
      { path: 'category', component: CategoryManage },
      { path: 'product', component: ProductManage },
      { path: 'inquiry', component: InquiryManage },
      { path: 'profile', component: UserProfile },
    ]
  }
];

const router = createRouter({
  history: createWebHistory(),
  routes,
});

router.beforeEach((to, from, next) => {
  const token = localStorage.getItem('token');
  if (to.path !== '/login' && !token) {
    next('/login');
  } else {
    next();
  }
});

export default router;
```

---

## 4. ç”¨æˆ·çŠ¶æ€ç®¡ç† src/store/user.js

```js
import { reactive } from 'vue';

export const userStore = reactive({
  username: '',
  setUsername(name) {
    this.username = name;
  }
});
```

---

## 5. main.js

```js
import { createApp } from 'vue';
import App from './App.vue';
import router from './router/index';
import ElementPlus from 'element-plus';
import 'element-plus/dist/index.css';

const app = createApp(App);
app.use(router);
app.use(ElementPlus);
app.mount('#app');
```

---

## 6. App.vue

```vue
<template>
  <router-view />
</template>
```

## 7. å„é¡µé¢è¯¦ç»†ä»£ç æ¨¡æ¿

### 7.1 Login.vue

```vue
<template>
  <el-row justify="center" align="middle" style="height:100vh;">
    <el-col :span="6">
      <el-card>
        <h2 style="text-align:center;">åå°ç™»å½•</h2>
        <el-form :model="form" @submit.prevent="onLogin">
          <el-form-item label="ç”¨æˆ·å">
            <el-input v-model="form.username" autocomplete="off" />
          </el-form-item>
          <el-form-item label="å¯†ç ">
            <el-input v-model="form.password" type="password" autocomplete="off" />
          </el-form-item>
          <el-form-item>
            <el-button type="primary" @click="onLogin" :loading="loading" style="width:100%;">ç™»å½•</el-button>
          </el-form-item>
        </el-form>
      </el-card>
    </el-col>
  </el-row>
</template>

<script setup>
import { ref } from 'vue';
import { useRouter } from 'vue-router';
import { login } from '../api/user';

const router = useRouter();
const form = ref({ username: '', password: '' });
const loading = ref(false);

const onLogin = async () => {
  loading.value = true;
  try {
    const res = await login(form.value.username, form.value.password);
    localStorage.setItem('token', res.data.access_token);
    router.push('/');
  } catch (e) {
    ElMessage.error(e.response?.data?.detail || 'ç™»å½•å¤±è´¥');
  } finally {
    loading.value = false;
  }
};
</script>
```

---

### 7.2 Dashboard.vue

```vue
<template>
  <el-container style="height:100vh;">
    <el-aside width="200px">
      <el-menu :default-active="activeMenu" router>
        <el-menu-item index="/company">å…¬å¸ä¿¡æ¯</el-menu-item>
        <el-menu-item index="/category">åˆ†ç±»ç®¡ç†</el-menu-item>
        <el-menu-item index="/product">äº§å“ç®¡ç†</el-menu-item>
        <el-menu-item index="/inquiry">è¯¢ä»·ç®¡ç†</el-menu-item>
        <el-menu-item index="/profile">ä¸ªäººä¸­å¿ƒ</el-menu-item>
      </el-menu>
    </el-aside>
    <el-container>
      <el-header>
        <span>ä¼ä¸šåå°ç®¡ç†ç³»ç»Ÿ</span>
        <el-button style="float:right;" @click="logout" type="danger" size="small">é€€å‡º</el-button>
      </el-header>
      <el-main>
        <router-view />
      </el-main>
    </el-container>
  </el-container>
</template>

<script setup>
import { useRouter, useRoute } from 'vue-router';

const router = useRouter();
const route = useRoute();
const activeMenu = route.path;

const logout = () => {
  localStorage.removeItem('token');
  router.push('/login');
};
</script>
```

### 7.3 CompanyInfo.vue

```vue
<template>
  <el-card>
    <h2>å…¬å¸ä¿¡æ¯ç®¡ç†</h2>
    <el-form :model="form" label-width="120px">
      <el-form-item label="å…¬å¸ä¸­æ–‡å">
        <el-input v-model="form.company_name_cn" />
      </el-form-item>
      <el-form-item label="å…¬å¸è‹±æ–‡å">
        <el-input v-model="form.company_name_en" />
      </el-form-item>
      <el-form-item label="Logo">
        <el-input v-model="form.logo" />
      </el-form-item>
      <el-form-item label="ä¼ä¸šèƒŒæ™¯">
        <el-input v-model="form.background" type="textarea" />
      </el-form-item>
      <el-form-item label="ä¸»è¥ä¸šåŠ¡">
        <el-input v-model="form.business" type="textarea" />
      </el-form-item>
      <el-form-item label="å·¥å‚ä»‹ç»">
        <el-input v-model="form.factory_intro" type="textarea" />
      </el-form-item>
      <el-form-item label="å…¬å¸åœ°å€">
        <el-input v-model="form.address" />
      </el-form-item>
      <el-form-item label="é‚®ç®±">
        <el-input v-model="form.email" />
      </el-form-item>
      <el-form-item>
        <el-button type="primary" @click="onSave">ä¿å­˜</el-button>
        <el-button type="danger" @click="onDelete" v-if="form.id">åˆ é™¤</el-button>
      </el-form-item>
    </el-form>
  </el-card>
</template>

<script setup>
import { ref, onMounted } from 'vue';
import { getCompanyInfo, createCompanyInfo, updateCompanyInfo, deleteCompanyInfo } from '../api/company';

const form = ref({
  company_name_cn: '',
  company_name_en: '',
  logo: '',
  background: '',
  business: '',
  factory_intro: '',
  address: '',
  email: '',
  id: null
});

const fetchInfo = async () => {
  try {
    const res = await getCompanyInfo();
    Object.assign(form.value, res.data, { id: res.data.id });
  } catch {
    // æœªè®¾ç½®å…¬å¸ä¿¡æ¯
  }
};

const onSave = async () => {
  try {
    if (form.value.id) {
      await updateCompanyInfo(form.value);
      ElMessage.success('æ›´æ–°æˆåŠŸ');
    } else {
      await createCompanyInfo(form.value);
      ElMessage.success('åˆ›å»ºæˆåŠŸ');
    }
    fetchInfo();
  } catch (e) {
    ElMessage.error(e.response?.data?.detail || 'ä¿å­˜å¤±è´¥');
  }
};

const onDelete = async () => {
  try {
    await deleteCompanyInfo();
    ElMessage.success('åˆ é™¤æˆåŠŸ');
    Object.keys(form.value).forEach(k => form.value[k] = '');
    form.value.id = null;
  } catch (e) {
    ElMessage.error(e.response?.data?.detail || 'åˆ é™¤å¤±è´¥');
  }
};

onMounted(fetchInfo);
</script>
```

### 7.4 CategoryManage.vue

```vue
<template>
  <el-card>
    <h2>åˆ†ç±»ç®¡ç†</h2>
    <el-button type="primary" @click="showAdd = true">æ–°å¢åˆ†ç±»</el-button>
    <el-table :data="categories" style="margin-top:20px;">
      <el-table-column prop="id" label="ID" width="60" />
      <el-table-column prop="name" label="åˆ†ç±»åç§°" />
      <el-table-column prop="parent_id" label="çˆ¶çº§ID" />
      <el-table-column label="æ“ä½œ">
        <template #default="scope">
          <el-button size="small" @click="editCategory(scope.row)">ç¼–è¾‘</el-button>
          <el-button size="small" type="danger" @click="deleteCategory(scope.row.id)">åˆ é™¤</el-button>
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
    </el-table>
    <el-dialog v-model="showAdd" title="æ–°å¢/ç¼–è¾‘åˆ†ç±»">
      <el-form :model="editForm">
        <el-form-item label="åˆ†ç±»åç§°">
          <el-input v-model="editForm.name" />
        </el-form-item>
        <el-form-item label="çˆ¶çº§ID">
          <el-input v-model="editForm.parent_id" />
        </el-form-item>
      </el-form>
      <template #footer>
        <el-button @click="showAdd = false">å–æ¶ˆ</el-button>
        <el-button type="primary" @click="saveCategory">ä¿å­˜</el-button>
      </template>
    </el-dialog>
  </el-card>
</template>

<script setup>
import { ref, onMounted } from 'vue';
import { getCategories, createCategory, updateCategory, deleteCategory } from '../api/category';

const categories = ref([]);
const showAdd = ref(false);
const editForm = ref({ id: null, name: '', parent_id: null });

const fetchCategories = async () => {
  const res = await getCategories();
  categories.value = res.data;
};

const editCategory = (row) => {
  editForm.value = { ...row };
  showAdd.value = true;
};

const saveCategory = async () => {
  try {
    if (editForm.value.id) {
      await updateCategory(editForm.value.id, editForm.value);
      ElMessage.success('æ›´æ–°æˆåŠŸ');
    } else {
      await createCategory(editForm.value);
      ElMessage.success('åˆ›å»ºæˆåŠŸ');
    }
    showAdd.value = false;
    fetchCategories();
  } catch (e) {
    ElMessage.error(e.response?.data?.detail || 'ä¿å­˜å¤±è´¥');
  }
};

const deleteCategory = async (id) => {
  try {
    await deleteCategory(id);
    ElMessage.success('åˆ é™¤æˆåŠŸ');
    fetchCategories();
  } catch (e) {
    ElMessage.error(e.response?.data?.detail || 'åˆ é™¤å¤±è´¥');
  }
};

onMounted(fetchCategories);
</script>
```

### 7.5 ProductManage.vue

```vue
<template>
  <el-card>
    <h2>äº§å“ç®¡ç†</h2>
    <el-button type="primary" @click="showAdd = true">æ–°å¢äº§å“</el-button>
    <el-table :data="products" style="margin-top:20px;">
      <el-table-column prop="id" label="ID" width="60" />
      <el-table-column prop="title" label="æ ‡é¢˜" />
      <el-table-column prop="model" label="å‹å·" />
      <el-table-column prop="category_id" label="åˆ†ç±»ID" />
      <el-table-column prop="brief" label="ç®€è¦ä»‹ç»" />
      <el-table-column label="æ“ä½œ">
        <template #default="scope">
          <el-button size="small" @click="editProduct(scope.row)">ç¼–è¾‘</el-button>
          <el-button size="small" type="danger" @click="deleteProduct(scope.row.id)">åˆ é™¤</el-button>
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
    </el-table>
    <el-dialog v-model="showAdd" title="æ–°å¢/ç¼–è¾‘äº§å“">
      <el-form :model="editForm">
        <el-form-item label="æ ‡é¢˜">
          <el-input v-model="editForm.title" />
        </el-form-item>
        <el-form-item label="å‹å·">
          <el-input v-model="editForm.model" />
        </el-form-item>
        <el-form-item label="åˆ†ç±»ID">
          <el-input v-model="editForm.category_id" />
        </el-form-item>
        <el-form-item label="ç®€è¦ä»‹ç»">
          <el-input v-model="editForm.brief" />
        </el-form-item>
        <el-form-item label="è¯¦æƒ…ä»‹ç»">
          <el-input v-model="editForm.detail" type="textarea" />
        </el-form-item>
        <el-form-item label="å›¾ç‰‡URL">
          <el-input v-model="editForm.image" />
        </el-form-item>
      </el-form>
      <template #footer>
        <el-button @click="showAdd = false">å–æ¶ˆ</el-button>
        <el-button type="primary" @click="saveProduct">ä¿å­˜</el-button>
      </template>
    </el-dialog>
  </el-card>
</template>

<script setup>
import { ref, onMounted } from 'vue';
import { getProducts, createProduct, updateProduct, deleteProduct } from '../api/product';

const products = ref([]);
const showAdd = ref(false);
const editForm = ref({ id: null, title: '', model: '', category_id: '', brief: '', detail: '', image: '' });

const fetchProducts = async () => {
  const res = await getProducts();
  products.value = res.data;
};

const editProduct = (row) => {
  editForm.value = { ...row };
  showAdd.value = true;
};

const saveProduct = async () => {
  try {
    if (editForm.value.id) {
      await updateProduct(editForm.value.id, editForm.value);
      ElMessage.success('æ›´æ–°æˆåŠŸ');
    } else {
      await createProduct(editForm.value);
      ElMessage.success('åˆ›å»ºæˆåŠŸ');
    }
    showAdd.value = false;
    fetchProducts();
  } catch (e) {
    ElMessage.error(e.response?.data?.detail || 'ä¿å­˜å¤±è´¥');
  }
};

const deleteProduct = async (id) => {
  try {
    await deleteProduct(id);
    ElMessage.success('åˆ é™¤æˆåŠŸ');
    fetchProducts();
  } catch (e) {
    ElMessage.error(e.response?.data?.detail || 'åˆ é™¤å¤±è´¥');
  }
};

onMounted(fetchProducts);
</script>
```

### 7.6 InquiryManage.vue

```vue
<template>
  <el-card>
    <h2>è¯¢ä»·ç®¡ç†</h2>
    <el-table :data="inquiries">
      <el-table-column prop="id" label="ID" width="60" />
      <el-table-column prop="product_id" label="äº§å“ID" />
      <el-table-column prop="email" label="å®¢æˆ·é‚®ç®±" />
      <el-table-column prop="content" label="å†…å®¹" />
      <el-table-column prop="created_at" label="æ—¶é—´" />
      <el-table-column label="æ“ä½œ">
        <template #default="scope">
          <el-button size="small" @click="viewInquiry(scope.row)">æŸ¥çœ‹</el-button>
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
    </el-table>
    <el-dialog v-model="showDetail" title="è¯¢ä»·è¯¦æƒ…">
      <el-descriptions :column="1">
        <el-descriptions-item label="äº§å“ID">{{ detail.product_id }}</el-descriptions-item>
        <el-descriptions-item label="é‚®ç®±">{{ detail.email }}</el-descriptions-item>
        <el-descriptions-item label="å†…å®¹">{{ detail.content }}</el-descriptions-item>
        <el-descriptions-item label="æ—¶é—´">{{ detail.created_at }}</el-descriptions-item>
      </el-descriptions>
      <template #footer>
        <el-button @click="showDetail = false">å…³é—­</el-button>
      </template>
    </el-dialog>
  </el-card>
</template>

<script setup>
import { ref, onMounted } from 'vue';
import { getInquiries, getInquiry } from '../api/inquiry';

const inquiries = ref([]);
const showDetail = ref(false);
const detail = ref({});

const fetchInquiries = async () => {
  const res = await getInquiries();
  inquiries.value = res.data;
};

const viewInquiry = async (row) => {
  const res = await getInquiry(row.id);
  detail.value = res.data;
  showDetail.value = true;
};

onMounted(fetchInquiries);
</script>
```

### 7.7 UserProfile.vue

```vue
<template>
  <el-card>
    <h2>ä¿®æ”¹å¯†ç </h2>
    <el-form :model="form" label-width="100px">
      <el-form-item label="ç”¨æˆ·å">
        <el-input v-model="form.username" />
      </el-form-item>
      <el-form-item label="åŸå¯†ç ">
        <el-input v-model="form.oldPassword" type="password" />
      </el-form-item>
      <el-form-item label="æ–°å¯†ç ">
        <el-input v-model="form.newPassword" type="password" />
      </el-form-item>
      <el-form-item>
        <el-button type="primary" @click="onChangePassword">ä¿®æ”¹</el-button>
      </el-form-item>
    </el-form>
  </el-card>
</template>

<script setup>
import { ref } from 'vue';
import { changePassword } from '../api/user';

const form = ref({ username: '', oldPassword: '', newPassword: '' });

const onChangePassword = async () => {
  try {
    await changePassword(form.value.username, form.value.oldPassword, form.value.newPassword);
    ElMessage.success('ä¿®æ”¹æˆåŠŸ');
    form.value.oldPassword = '';
    form.value.newPassword = '';
  } catch (e) {
    ElMessage.error(e.response?.data?.detail || 'ä¿®æ”¹å¤±è´¥');
  }
};
</script>
```

å¦‚éœ€**å®Œæ•´ä»£ç åŒ…**æˆ–æœ‰ç‰¹æ®Šå®šåˆ¶éœ€æ±‚ï¼Œè¯·å‘ŠçŸ¥ï¼å¦‚æœéœ€è¦å°†è¿™äº›ä»£ç è‡ªåŠ¨å†™å…¥åˆ°ä½ çš„é¡¹ç›®æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹ï¼Œè¯·å›å¤â€œå†™å…¥é¡¹ç›®â€æˆ–æŒ‡å®šéœ€è¦å†™å…¥çš„é¡µé¢ã€‚

---

_**User**_

æˆ‘è¦å®Œæ•´çš„è¯¦ç»†ä»£ç æ›´æ–°åˆ°é¡¹ç›®ä¸­ï¼Œä»£ç ä¸ç”¨æ›´æ–°åˆ°readmeæ–‡æ¡£ã€‚

```diff
+ import { createRouter, createWebHistory } from 'vue-router';
+ import Login from '../views/Login.vue';
+ import Dashboard from '../views/Dashboard.vue';
+ import CompanyInfo from '../views/CompanyInfo.vue';
+ import CategoryManage from '../views/CategoryManage.vue';
+ import ProductManage from '../views/ProductManage.vue';
+ import InquiryManage from '../views/InquiryManage.vue';
+ import UserProfile from '../views/UserProfile.vue';
+ 
+ const routes = [
+   { path: '/login', component: Login },
+   {
+     path: '/',
+     component: Dashboard,
+     children: [
+       { path: '', redirect: '/company' },
+       { path: 'company', component: CompanyInfo },
+       { path: 'category', component: CategoryManage },
+       { path: 'product', component: ProductManage },
+       { path: 'inquiry', component: InquiryManage },
+       { path: 'profile', component: UserProfile },
+     ]
+   }
+ ];
+ 
+ const router = createRouter({
+   history: createWebHistory(),
+   routes,
+ });
+ 
+ router.beforeEach((to, from, next) => {
+   const token = localStorage.getItem('token');
+   if (to.path !== '/login' && !token) {
+     next('/login');
+   } else {
+     next();
+   }
+ });
+ 
+ export default router; 
```

```diff
+ import { login } from '../api/user';
+ 
+ const router = useRouter();
+ const form = ref({ username: '', password: '' });
+ const loading = ref(false);
+ 
+ const onLogin = async () => {
+   loading.value = true;
+   try {
+     const res = await login(form.value.username, form.value.password);
+     localStorage.setItem('token', res.data.access_token);
+     router.push('/');
+   } catch (e) {
+     ElMessage.error(e.response?.data?.detail || 'ç™»å½•å¤±è´¥');
+   } finally {
+     loading.value = false;
+   }
+ };
+ </script>
```

```diff
+     ElMessage.error(e.response?.data?.detail || 'åˆ é™¤å¤±è´¥');
```

```vue

    <el-col :span="6">

        <el-form :model="form" @submit.prevent="onLogin">

            <el-input v-model="form.username" autocomplete="off" />
          </el-form-item>

          </el-form-item>

  </el-row>

<script setup>

import { useRouter } from 'vue-router';
import { login } from '../api/user';

const router = useRouter();
const form = ref({ username: '', password: '' });
const loading = ref(false);

const onLogin = async () => {
  loading.value = true;
  try {
    const res = await login(form.value.username, form.value.password);
    localStorage.setItem('token', res.data.access_token);
    router.push('/');
  } catch (e) {
    ElMessage.error(e.response?.data?.detail || 'ç™»å½•å¤±è´¥');
  } finally {
    loading.value = false;
  }
};
</script>
```
